title: Media Recordings
description: The Latin American and Caribbean Studies program video records many of its se
cleaned_text: Media Recordings The Latin American and Caribbean Studies program video records many of its seminar series, annual lecturer, and LACS public issues forum events; in addition, we also have a special video on Ecuador's Ecosystems. The link below will lead you to the LACS YouTube site where you can browse the selection of lectures. Here are some of the most recent ones. Video Recordings of Seminars and other Lecture/Panel Events - Dolors Armenteras | [Fires and Forest lost in the Colombian Amazon](https://youtu.be/-ILaggnb1s8)| 9 May 2023 - Franco Leal-Yepes | [Dairying in Latin America: A Story of Growth, Sustainability, and Food Security](https://youtu.be/W3JBpkNlNtU)| 3 May 2023 - Tessa Murphy & Heather Roller | [Indigenous-European Encounters in the Caribbean and Brazil](https://youtu.be/0qWLFOpZPk0)| 2 May 2023 - Frederick Payton and Michael Cox | [Socio-Eco Benefits of Collective Rice Certification in the Dominican Republic](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jcHtcsqwRCU)| 2023 Francio Guadeloupe | Disorder in Contemporary State Building in Latin America](https://youtu.be/zl_jIsaVmAg)| 18 April 2023 -
